name: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol. 17: Planetarium
overview: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol.17 - Planetarium is the 17th game in the practical 1500 series released for the Playstation One console by D3 Publisher. This time the game let the user have an interactive planetarium with information about the Universe, the planets, constellations, etc. The game features also a quiz mode.
